DOC.brief_summary: Sexual dysfunction common male patient chronic renal failure dialysis renal trasnplantation . Multiple factor play role important clinical problem . Recent study suggest certain immunosuppressive medication use solid organ transplant may affect male sexual function . The purpose study compare sexual function male renal transplant patient sirolimus patient sirolimus immunosuppression .
DOC.brief_title: Sexual Function Male Renal Transplant Patients
DOC.detailed_description: All male renal transplant recipient function allograft 1 month post transplant eligible participate prospective serial observation study . As roughly half renal transplant patient assign rapamycin immunnosuppression clinically half , plan assess routine clinical perameters , sex hormone level , subjective sexual function measure standardized questionnaire semen analysis 55 patient sirolimus treatment 55 patient treatment . Assessment make baseline ( 1 mo post transplant ) 6 12 month later . All adult male renal transplant recipient age 21-65 dialysis 1 mo post transplant eleigible . Exclusion criterion female gender , patient require testosterone therapy , patient dialysis , unwilling give inform consent .
